mapper.sql: id, `name`, config_key, config_value, `type`, create_staff_id, create_time, update_staff_id, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
select
from spring_cloud.sys_config
and sys_config.name like concat('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and sys_config.config_key like concat('%', #{configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and sys_config.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and sys_config.remark like concat('%', #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into spring_cloud.sys_config (id, `name`, config_key, config_value, `type`, create_staff_id, create_time, update_staff_id, update_time, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update spring_cloud.sys_config
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
config_key = #{configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
config_value = #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_staff_id = #{createStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_staff_id = #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into spring_cloud.sys_config (id, `name`, config_key, config_value, `type`, create_staff_id, create_time, update_staff_id, update_time, remark) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateStaffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select
from spring_cloud.sys_config
and sys_config.name like concat('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and sys_config.config_key like concat('%', #{configKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and sys_config.type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and sys_config.remark like concat('%', #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and sys_config.id != #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
